reviewText:
I purchased the box set hoping to get a good documentary,but alhtough informative all three episodes are not even close to anything produced by History channel.
I love history,but this documentaries are indeed a boring!

Very nice trio. The crusades one was a bit rougher in production and should have gone into the 4th crusade in depth and mentioned the last 5 with more than  a footnote on the fall of Acre in 1291 but still nice history of the first 3 crusades, the Agincourt and the War of the Roses were very informative. I would have liked to see more on the Battle of Bosworth mostly to wash the Shakespeare version out as a historical work! Nice series, glad I bought it. Would reccomend for school studies.
Once again the English got it right.  No repeating scenes and burning up time.  Tells a great story and historically accurate.  Bravo!
